title: Garlic Butter Salmon
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Place the salmon fillets on a baking tray lined with parchment paper.
Melt the butter and mix with minced garlic, olive oil, salt, and black pepper.
Pour the garlic butter mixture over the salmon fillets.
Bake for 20 minutes or until the salmon is flaky.
Squeeze fresh lemon juice over the salmon before serving.

title: Chicken Piccata
instructions: Season chicken and sear it in olive oil until golden.
Deglaze the pan with chicken stock and lemon juice.
Add capers and butter, simmering until the sauce thickens.
Serve with parsley sprinkled on top.

title: Grilled Ribeye with Garlic Butter
instructions: Season the ribeye steaks with salt and pepper.
Grill the steaks to desired doneness.
Melt butter with minced garlic and drizzle over steaks.

title: Shrimp Scampi with Linguine
instructions: Boil linguine until al dente.
Sauté garlic and shrimp in butter until shrimp turns pink.
Mix with linguine and top with parsley.

title: Beef and Mushroom Stroganoff
instructions: Sauté onions and mushrooms in butter.
Add beef strips and cook until browned.
Stir in sour cream and simmer for 10 minutes.

title: Lamb Chops with Rosemary
instructions: Rub lamb chops with rosemary and garlic.
Sear the lamb in olive oil until browned.
Let rest for 5 minutes before serving.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Grill the chicken breast and slice it.
Toss romaine lettuce with parmesan and croutons.
Top with chicken slices and Caesar dressing.

title: Baked Salmon with Dill Sauce
instructions: Bake salmon fillets at 400°F for 15 minutes.
Mix dill, yogurt, and lemon juice for sauce.
Serve the sauce over salmon.

title: Pork Tenderloin with Apples
instructions: Sear pork tenderloin in butter.
Add sliced apples and thyme, and roast at 375°F for 20 minutes.

title: Lobster Bisque
instructions: Sauté onions in butter.
Add lobster meat and cream, simmering for 10 minutes.
Blend until smooth and serve.
